hero.headline: AI Voice Agents that Book More Appointments and Close More Deals
hero.subheadline: 24/7 phone coverage with human-level voice, qualifying leads, handling calls, and syncing your CRM automatically.

valuePillars.title: Why Choose AI Voice Agents?
valuePillars.subtitle: Transform your phone experience with AI that works around the clock, sounds completely human, and drives real business results.

alwaysOn.title: Always On
alwaysOn.description: Never miss a lead again with 24/7 phone coverage that responds in under 2 minutes.

lowerCost.title: Lower Cost
lowerCost.description: Replace or augment call center teams while improving response time and consistency.

revenueReady.title: Revenue-Ready
revenueReady.description: Qualifies leads, schedules appointments, updates CRM, and triggers automated workflows.

humanLevel.title: Human-Level Voice
humanLevel.description: Natural conversation with memory, context, and emotional intelligence that customers trust.

audioDemo.title: Hear It In Action
audioDemo.subtitle: Listen to real conversations powered by our AI voice agents. Each agent is customized for your industry and use case.

receptionist.name: Receptionist
receptionist.description: Answering calls, booking appointments, handling FAQs
receptionist.script: Thanks for calling Metro Dental. I can book you in today - may I have your name and preferred time? We accept most insurance plans including BlueCross. I have Tuesday 10:30 or Wednesday 4:00 PM available. What works best for you?

outbound.name: Outbound Sales
outbound.description: Following up on leads, qualifying prospects
outbound.script: Hi Sarah, this is the booking line for Home Pro Services. You requested a quote for kitchen renovation yesterday. I can schedule our designer to visit this week - would morning or afternoon work better for you?

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Get up and running with enterprise-grade AI voice agents in under 3 weeks. Our proven implementation process ensures success from day one.

week1.title: Connect & Configure
week1.description: Connect your phone number and CRM. We'll configure call flows, compliance settings, and voice preferences.

week2.title: Customize & Train
week2.description: Build custom conversation flows, train the AI with your FAQs, and fine-tune the voice to match your brand.

week3.title: Go Live & Monitor
week3.description: Launch your AI voice agent with real-time monitoring, analytics dashboard, and continuous optimization.
